text: N’iki gitabu gitagatifu ca Qur’ani n’igitabu twamanuye gifise imihezagiro myinshi, kikaba cemeza ivyabayeho imbere yaco, rero kugira ngo ubatuze abantu bo mugisagara c’Imakkat, hamwe n’abantu bagikikuje hamwe n’abemera umusi w’imperuka bakaba bacemera, nabo kumasengesho yabo barayitegereza cane
